description:
Order Fulfillment Clerk receives and processes orders for materials and merchandise. Utilizes order tracking and CRM systems to process orders, record prices, delivery dates, inventory status, maintain customer information and other data related to each transaction. Being an Order Fulfillment Clerk confirms orders, updates shipping status, and notifies customers of any backorder or delivery delays. Researches and resolves order errors and updates the system.

Additionally, Order Fulfillment Clerk I may prepare packing lists or other order-related documentation. Requires a high school diploma or equivalent.

This is a full-time position; hours are typically from 9:00 am to 5:30 pm M-F with overtime as needed.

Company Description

Coalition LA is a jacket and outwear company formed by a husband and wife team in 2010. We work hard to bring the best product to our customers (without the drama of a husband and wife team :).

We treat everyone as a family and strive to have the best possible experiences. We hope you are interested in joining our family.
